name: Vaxxurkid
description:
You found out that the kid next door has not been vaccinated,
send him a virus before his parents decide to vaccinate their kid  You are a mad bio with a lot of free time who hates anti-vaxxers.
Your first victim  is your neighbor Jimmy who had not been vaccinated yet.  Make Viruses that will annihilate Jimmy's whole career.  
Build the most infectious and deadliest virus humanity has yet to see  Fight off the immune system and kill the host  Become the very best virus that no one ever was!
Mission Start!
